name: Micellar Casein
explanation: A slowly digested protein powder that can help promote muscle growth and recovery at night, with a moderate risk of bloating.

name: Yellow 5
explanation: Yellow 5, also known as Tartrazine, is an artificial food dye used to impart a yellow color to food products, including candies, baked goods, and soft drinks. It has no nutritional value.

name: Dextrose
explanation: Fast-digesting carbohydrate, may cause a short-term spike in blood sugar

name: Palm Oil
explanation: A saturated fat commonly used in cooking and baking. High bioavailability due to its triglyceride structure
